app_title: NLUI MCP - Natural Language User Interface
app_description: Natural Language User Interface Framework powered by Model Context Protocol
main_subtitle: Building intelligent interfaces with Model Context Protocol
error_404_description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
error_500_description: Something went wrong on our servers. Please try again later.
error_403_description: You don't have permission to access this resource.
error_400_description: The request could not be understood by the server.
error_default_description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
help_description: Explore and learn how to use NLUI components with interactive examples and code snippets
help_page_description: Learn how to properly configure and use the Natural Language User Interface
help_usage_description: To use NLUI, you need to provide configuration parameters in one of the following ways:
help_url_params_description: Add the 'nlui' parameter to the URL with a JSON string containing the configuration
help_session_storage_description: Store the configuration in sessionStorage under the 'nluiProp_[sessionId]' key, where sessionId comes from URL parameter
render_error_description: The UI component could not be rendered properly. This might be due to invalid configuration or missing data.
table_no_data_description: There is no data to display in this table
list_no_search_results_description: Please try searching with different keywords
list_no_data_description: There are no items to display in this list
demo_description: Experience the power of Natural Language User Interface
demo_input_placeholder: Enter your requirements, e.g.: Create an employee information table
error_validation: Input data validation failed, please check your input
error_network: Network connection error, please check your network settings
error_api: API call failed, please try again later
error_render: UI component rendering failed, configuration may be incorrect
error_config: Configuration error, please check related settings
error_permission: Insufficient permissions to perform this operation
error_unknown: An unknown error occurred, please contact technical support
